column3:
A problem weighs heavy on Eshana's mind.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Obtain fish mint at East End.
Deliver the fish mint to Jagranti.
Deliver the jar of fish mint salve to Eshana.
<Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. I have need of your assistance in preparing supplies quite vital to me and my sssisters.

As you know, we Ananta take great pride in the appearance of our skin, and the lussstrous sheen of our scales. We require a special salve for our tails, which are prone to scarring from our ceaselesss patrols of the area.

Before I can distribute any to my sssisters, however, we must ready ingredients to make more. It requires a great deal of time to produce, you see, and I would not have our ssstores empty the next time we are in need of treatment.

I would ask you to travel to East End and procure four leaves of fish mint, a medicinal plant which grows at the base of the trees there. When you've found them, pray deliver them to Jagranti. She is the head of our medical station.
Would that I could go and retrieve more herbs for our medicine, but I cannot leave this place unattended.
Eshana requires salve for our sssisters? Then she knows we must first have more herbs.
Ah, this is more than enough. Thank you. I'll set to making more sssalve right away.
For now give her this. It is the last of our reserves until I can make more. This will take time of course, but it should be ready before we have need of it.
You are returned. Was Jagranti able to provide you with any sssalve?
Wonderful. My sssisters will be relieved to have this.
Care for our tails is more than a matter of beauty, after all.
A tail marred with scars for usss is like a pair of boots riddled with holes for you ssstriders. We can have no hindrances if we are to respond quickly to an emergency.
Take that salve to Eshana. Our ssstores should be replenished before we have need of it again.
